title: Man arrested for murder of woman in Delhi
description: A 25-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly killing a woman he met on a dating app in Delhi. The accused, identified as Rahul, confessed to strangling the woman after she refused to marry him.

title: Three robbers shot dead by police in Mumbai
description: Three robbers who were involved in a series of crimes in Mumbai were shot dead by the police in an encounter on Wednesday. The police said they recovered four pistols, two knives and cash from the deceased.

title: Woman gang-raped, burnt alive in Bihar
description: A 22-year-old woman was gang-raped and burnt alive by four men in Bihar's Buxar district on Tuesday. The police have arrested two of the accused and are looking for the other two. The woman's family has alleged that the accused were known to them and had a dispute over land.

title: Jilted lover attacks woman, stabs her brother to death in Hyderabad
description: A young man from Hyderabad killed an engineering graduate and injured his sister at their residence on Sunday, allegedly due to a romantic involvement with the woman.

title: Six-year-old raped girl raped in Madhya Pradesh's Umaria, one held
description: A six-year-old girl was allegedly raped by a man in Madhya Pradesh's Umaria district. The accused, who is a relative of the victim, has been arrested.

title: Woman allegedly strangled to death by parents, brother in Gurugram
description: A 22-year-old woman was allegedly strangled to death by her parents and brother in Gurugram for marrying a man of her choice. The police have arrested the accused and booked them for murder and dowry harassment.

title: Delhi shocker! Woman kills live-in partner's 11-year-old son, stuffs body in bed box
description: A woman in Delhi allegedly killed her live-in partner's 11-year-old son and stuffed his body in a bed box. The police said the woman was unhappy with the boy's presence and wanted to get rid of him.
